subject: RE: [junit] Junit and Ant
msgSnippet: 1. Make sure junit works. 2. For Ant, add to Machine classpath following: ANT_HOME =  ant home directory JAVA_HOME =  jdk directory 3. Add all relevant
messageBody:
1. Make sure junit works.
2. For Ant, add to Machine classpath following:
ANT_HOME = "ant home directory"
JAVA_HOME = "jdk directory"
3. Add all relevant .jar , .war , .ear files inside /lib directory of ant
4. Add paths of jars & db2java.zip inside build.xml
5. Run ANT


Thanks & Regards,
Dinesh Metkari

for it/
